note.p: American botanist. Vice-president of the Syracuse Botanical Club in 1881. Wife of Martin Still (1820–97), bookkeeper, of Syracuse, New York.
Bulletin of the Torrey Botanical Club 8 (1881): 60
United States Federal Census 1880 (Syracuse, Onondaga, New York 211/253A) (Ancestry.com, accessed 11 March 2021)
U.S., Find a grave index, 1600s–current (Ancestry.com, accessed 11 March 2021)
